name: Classic Road: Yuushun 2
overview: Classic Road Yuushun 2 is one of the games in the Classic Road game series for the Playstation console (Classic Road Yuushun 1 was only released in Sega Saturn) and is also a horse breeding game. In the game the player can compete in different races around Japan. The game features different horse breeds, racing stadiums, the horses datas from 1988 until 1998 and the goal of the game is to have a horse champion. The player can't control the horse during the races, so it will depends of the horse training if he will win or not the races, the engine in the races is in 3d.
